text: Jaba timi pharkera uniharuko pasama pugchau ta uniharule timi samaksa bahana bana'une chan. Tapa'im bhanidinush yo bahana nabana'uh hamile timila'i kahilyai samco thanne chainaum. Allahale hamila'i timra brtanta bhanisakeko cha, . Ra pachi pani allaha ra usako rasulale timra kriyakalapa dekhnechan, ani yastako pasama pharka'inechau jo adrsya ra prakata sabaiko jnata cha. Ani jeâ€“jati kriyakalapa timile gardai'a'eka chau, usale timila'i bhanidinecha
